title: Bug 6412API Request  Package selection dialog including prereqs
description: Bug 6412API RequestPackage selection dialog including prereqs The Java debugger requires the ability to specify a "pacakge to run in" in thesnippet editor. To do this, we use the API on JavaUI to create a packageselection dialog for a project. However, we need to be able to choose frompackages in prereq projects/jars as well. Currently the API only specifiespackages in a single project.
